name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnackStats â€“ Track Your Food Delivery Spending

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is your all-in-one Chrome extension to track and visualize spending patterns across Uber Eats, DoorDash, and SkipTheDishes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnackStats is your go-to Chrome extension for uncovering and managing your food delivery habits. Whether you order from Uber Eats, DoorDash, or SkipTheDishes, SnackStats provides a comprehensive report detailing your spending patterns and favorite restaurants.

How to Use:

1. Log in: Make sure you're logged into your accounts on Uber Eats, DoorDash, and SkipTheDishes.
2. Click on SnackStats: Click the SnackStats extension icon located at the top of your browser.
3. Select an App: Choose the food delivery app (Uber Eats, DoorDash, or SkipTheDishes) whose stats you'd like to view.
4. Relax and Wait: The extension will automatically open the app's order window and handle all scrolling to load your orders.
5. View the Report: Once the report is ready, a new tab will open with comprehensive insights into your order history.

Note:  If the extension does not function properly on the first attempt, please close the delivery tab and try running the extension again.

Features include:

1. Total Spending Insights: Discover exactly how much you've spent across all apps and analyze trends over time.
2. Favorite Restaurant Tracking: Identify your top restaurants by order frequency and spending.
3. Annual & Monthly Breakdown: View annual and monthly stats to understand your eating habits and adjust as needed.
4. Favorite Restaurants by Month: See which restaurants were your favorites each month for more granular insights.
5. Pie, Bar, and Line Graphs: Visualize data with intuitive graphs and charts to make tracking simple and engaging.

Who can benefit from SnackStats?

1. Expense Managers: Users aiming to understand and control their delivery spending.
2. Data Enthusiasts: Explore your ordering trends with clear, detailed analytics.

Troubleshooting Tips:

1. Make sure your internet connection is stable and quick.
2. Restart Chrome if you've just installed the extension.
3. Close and reopen the app's order window if needed.



If you enjoy this extension, please leave a review in the comments and rate it!

With SnackStats, understanding your food journey is easier and more enjoyable than ever!
